Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2008 04:07PM glo wrote: LuAnn thank you so much for responding to me. I go to a support group and there is no one on faslodex, now I don't feel so alone. I would love to know more about that faslodex girlfriends. I have to go for my cat scan April 7th to see how this is working ANOTHER WAITING PERIOD!! Talk to you again. glo
Posts.Title: metastic disease glo jeanne46

Posts.Content: glo wrote: I recently found out I have metastic breast cancer. I would have been a four year survivor this April. My tumor markers were high and I had to have a pet scan and showed cancer cells in the lining of my pleura and one by my sternum, I had a mastectomy and recently been on arimidex and now am on faslodex. I would be real interested to hear from someone who was on faslodex also. I have been so down someone out there help pick me up! My doctor says to have a positive attitude I did until this happened a second time DONT KNOW HOW TO GET OUT OF THIS MOOD! Thanks Glo. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: metastic disease glo jeanne46
